document.full_text: lin yaofang said she hoped to fly to new york from china next week for the funeral of her husband, wang jianhua, whose body has lain in a funeral home since last month.
document.title: widow of bus crash victim receives visa for funeral
lines_and_colors: lin yaofang said she hoped to fly to new york from china next week for the funeral of her husband, wang jianhua, whose body has lain in a funeral home since last month.
